Module distort¶

Get DEFORMATION MATRIX for given spacegroup number and Lagranian strain.

Example:

import distort

dist = distort.Distort()                 # generate instance of distortion object
dist.sgn = sgn                           # set spacegroup number (int)
dist.set_strainList()                    # set strain list according to space group number

strainType = next(dist.strainList_iter)  # when using the iterator property --> get first distortion type
dist.eta = eta                           # define lagrangian strain (float)
dist.set_strainType(strainType)          # set strain type (string)
dist.set_defMatrix()                     # ste deformation matrix
dist.get_defMatrix()                     # get deformation matrix
class distort.Distort(volumeconserving=False, mthd='Energy', order=2)¶

Generate DEFORMATION MATRIX for given spacegroup number and Lagranian strain.

volumecoserving : boolean

mthd : string (‘Energy’/’Stress’)
method of calculation
order: integer (2 or 3)
specify order of elastic constants
set_eta(eta)¶

Set Lagrangian strain.

eta : float
Lagrangian strain value.
get_eta()¶
set_sgn(sgn)¶

Set spacegroup number.

sgn : int
Space group number of parent crystal structure.
get_sgn()¶
set_strainType(strainType=None)¶

Set current strain (deformation) type.

strainType : string
Strain type.
get_strainType()¶
set_defMatrix(code)¶

Calculate deformation matrix.

get_defMatrix()¶
set_strainList()¶

Finds list of deformation types for a specific crystal symmetry

get_strainList()¶
set_V0(V0)¶

Set equilibrium volume of parent structure.

V0 : float
Equilibrium volume of supercell.
get_V0()¶
set_LC(LC)¶
get_LC()¶
